title: QA Manager - USA-IL-Des Plaines
text:

Profile The QA team provides comprehensive test coverage —everything from functionality to large-scale performance testing. Spanning different technologies, from web-based client-facing applications, to legacy desktop apps, the QA Manager will ensure that each system works, performs and integrates with other systems to provide the best platform for Wheels and our customers.This role requires significant experience DEVELOPING AND WRITING AUTOMATED TEST SCRIPTS and experience MANAGING, COACHING AND DEVELOPING off shore and on site teams. The QA Manager will be the SME for the team on automated test writing using QTP, Selenium and Load Runner.As a QA Manager you will provide general leadership, direction and technical guidance to the QA staff in the analysis, design, testing and deployment of Wheels’ entire legacy, internal and external systems. You will oversee all aspects of quality assurance including establishing metrics, applying industry best practices, and developing new tools and processes to ensure quality goals are met. You will maintain ultimate responsibility for assuming that all products are defect free and compliant with technical specifications.Responsibilities:Supervisory and Technical GuidanceProvide necessary definition, development and deployment of the Wheels product quality assurance strategy, addressing all phases of product development and serving as SME on creating automated test scriptsDirectly supervise Quality Assurance Team Lead, Quality Assurance Engineers and Testers including the preparation and delivery of staff performance evaluations and career development activitiesManage department and overall expectations pertaining to setting accurate schedules, costs and resourcesEnsures delivery against QA department goals and objectives, i.e. meeting commitments and coordinating overall quality assurance scheduleWork with peers in the technology leadership team to coordinate activities and solve issues as they ariseProcess & Project ManagementManage the performance to planWork with Project Managers to develop project schedules and resource allocation models for QA related projects and other activities such as software deployment, customer
